metadata.synopsis: A pregnant teenager learns the true meaning of love and sacrifice after she runs away from her upscale family and winds up with the denizens of a decaying trailer park.

reviews: Despite the calculated setup and quirky characters, the film, like Juno and Bella, brings another pro-birth story to the big screen. May there be many more.
Rulin gives a warm, down-to-earth performance, which counters writer-director Dan Gordon's tendency to blow out the Quirk-O-Meter.
